item.title: How to import compressed MySQL file on the command line
item.description: zcat restores compressed files to their original forms, while pv monitor the progress of data through a pipe (in other words, allows users to view a progress of a data through a pipeline). Combining these two commands we can import a compressed MySQL database while vieweing the progress.
